# NSBorderType.bezelBorder

**Case**

A concave border that makes the view look sunken.

## Declaration

```swift
case bezelBorder
```

## Constants

- **NSBorderType.grooveBorder**: A thin border that looks etched around the image.
- **NSBorderType.lineBorder**: A black line border around the view.
- **NSBorderType.noBorder**: No border.
